A137246: 
a(n) = -3*a(n - 2) + 20*a(n - 1)
truth: 
a(n) = 20*a(n - 1) + -3*a(n - 2),  
a(0) = 2019, a(1) = 408588751354329124639992680363386400871518999632930896152601683134664268190408597357704529588397366093759260012897616915056029593364607849895943361355564680270037154226104640034244213230395713252319764966484927538103129218130364819951840297449
